mutants.code:
def find_remaining_ball_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, cnt) = case
        max_count = max(cnt)
        remaining_color = cnt.index(max_count) - 1
        results.append(remaining_color)
    return results

def find_remaining_ball_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, cnt) = case
        max_count = max(cnt)
        remaining_color = cnt.index(max_count) * 1
        results.append(remaining_color)
    return results

def find_remaining_ball_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, cnt) = case
        max_count = max(cnt)
        remaining_color = cnt.index(max_count) + 2
        results.append(remaining_color)
    return results

def find_remaining_ball_color(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (n, cnt) = case
        max_count = max(cnt)
        remaining_color = cnt.index(max_count) + -1
        results.append(remaining_color)
    return results
